Package distributed

Class Deploy

  • java.lang.Object
    • distributed.Deploy
  • public class Deploy
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines a Deploy program that distributes a Slave.jar file to a list of available machines.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Deploy()
      Empty constructor

      Main method.

      This method puts a file in a distant machine.

    • Method Detail

      • findAllMachines

        public void findAllMachines​(java.lang.String file,
                            java.lang.String username)
        This method finds the list of machines that are on in Telecom Paris.
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file in which to write the list of available machines.
        username - Username for establishing the ssh connection

      • testSSH

        public void testSSH​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String file,
                    int maxThreads)
        This method tests SSH connection with the machines of the file of available machines.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines that were tested positive.
        username - Username for establishing the ssh connection
        file - Name of the file that contains the list of available machines.
        maxThrads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor

      • makeDir

        public void makeDir​(java.lang.String machine,
                    java.lang.String dir,
                    boolean local,
                    int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method creates a directory, allowing to decide between doing it in the local machine or in a distant one
        Parameters:
        machine - Machine in which it has to create the directory.
        dir - Name of the directory to create
        local - Flag that indicates if the directory should be created in the local machine or in a distant one
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • putFile

        public void putFile​(java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue<java.lang.String> machines,
                    java.lang.String path,
                    java.lang.String file,
                    java.lang.String destDir,
                    java.lang.String destFile,
                    int amount,
                    int max_threads,
                    int MaxNumberOfTries)
        This method puts a file in a distant machine. If the directory does not exist, it creates it.
        Parameters:
        machines - List of machines
        path - Local path of the file
        file - Name of the file
        destDir - Name of the directory in which it has to copy the file
        destFile - Name of the file in the distant machine
        amount - Number of machines to which it has to copy the file
        max_threads - Maximum size of the ThreadPoolExecuor
        MaxNumberOfTries - Maximum number of times we may try to establish an ssh connection

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
        Main method. Finds the list of machines that are on and tests ssh connection. Puts Slave.jar in all machines that were tested positive.
        Parameters:
        args - [0] Name of the file that contains the list of available machines
        args - [1] SSH username
        args - [2] Working directory
